website_summaries.verdict: The official Batman rubber duck is both a funny gift for the Bat-Fan who has everything and an effective way to coax younger fans to wash up.
pros: Floats in the bath like the average rubber ducky

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower present
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my granddaughter. We don't know how well she'll like it yet, but I love it. It seems solid and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Ewoldsen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable but imbalanced
customer_reviews.text: While it looks great, the design has a significant flaw. It is too top heavy so that when you put it in water to float, like a rubber duck should, rather than staying upright, he immediately falls over to the left or right, essentially always floating on his side. Looks great out of the water though.
customer_reviews.author: RCRogers

customer_reviews.title: Packaging crushed, bad for collectors
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was crushed but Amazon box intact. This was a gift. Duck is good quality, good colors with even limes. Great collector item, but disappointed about the product package since that is part of the collection item.
customer_reviews.author: Sue1anne

customer_reviews.title: Baaaatduuck
customer_reviews.text: Good quality in general. The colors are crisp and don’t bleed outside were it should. Happy for product as desk accessory.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my Batman obsessed daughter. It shipped quickly and is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: The Batman approves, surely!
customer_reviews.text: This duck is adorable and good sized. Well made, licensed and fair price. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JelliJamz

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my niece who is having a boy and she is a fan of batman.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Serra

customer_reviews.title: More like bat duck
customer_reviews.text: Now my bath time is relaxing and enjoyable. Makes the bathroom welcoming.
customer_reviews.author: ██████████████

customer_reviews.title: It's so cute.
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for someone who loves Batman. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: A cute product.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and sturdy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect valentine's gift for my step son. Great price and value. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: YES to super hero versions of ducks!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been collecting ducks for several years, and this awesome Batman one was a birthday present. Batman has always been my favorite DC hero, so this is a fantastic addition to my ever-growing collection!! I love it!! Now I just need an Iron Man one... 😉
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl E. Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my friend's son. I asked her what he liked and she said Rubber Ducks, Batman, and Spiderman. This was the perfect gift and he was so surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Care' Woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Mine came without a whistle on the bottom, so I just took one from all the ducks We have and replaced it
customer_reviews.author: HoMeR GQ

customer_reviews.title: It looks like what the description two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: It was not in the package but I put it back in the package it's fine
customer_reviews.author: Robyne Fay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great looking! Nice for the Batman collection or a duck collection.
customer_reviews.author: kim turner

customer_reviews.title: Sad.
customer_reviews.text: The paint is no si well done. I’m desappointed. And why is there no WonderWoman, Green Lantern or other DC Comics caracters instead Superman, Batman, Aquaman, Joker and Harley Queen?
customer_reviews.author: Yannick Tetreault

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect little gift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect perfect perfect... especially for the new Jeep thing going on!
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't swim
customer_reviews.text: This duck goes down every time you put it in water. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: GGiungi

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boss she loves batman and rubber ducks. It is absolutely adorable. Looks just like the pic in life.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Walker

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Box was a little bent and everything however my boyfriend loves the flash so it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Sitton

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my purchase! I got it as a Christmas gift for a friend who collects rubber ducks! His favorite super hero is the flash so this worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Batman Ducky is a superhero to my 3 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.text: The Batman Ducky is a wonderful addition to my grandson’s ducky collection. It’s well made and came promptly. My grandson is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison K

customer_reviews.title: A quirky gift she loved
customer_reviews.text: Going along with a running joke. She was expecting of the BAT Duck that was coming her way. but she loved it none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Pellot Jr

customer_reviews.title: Won’t float upright.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that Batman Duck will not float upright! Not cool!
customer_reviews.author: HLR

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: High quality Exactly as shown in the photos Very sturdy and amazing Bathtub friend for all ages .
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Birriel

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my auntie as she collect them and she was super satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Guy Truzman

customer_reviews.title: BatDuck is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This guy is just as described & pictured. It was a birthday present for a friend who collects rubber ducks & BatDuck is a perfect addition.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality, 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality, planning to buy others in the future! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Krys007

product_meta.title: Paladone DC Comics Officially Licensed Merchandise - Batman Rubber Bath Duck - Rubber Ducky
feature_bullets: BATHTIME FUN: Here is a funny twist on the classic yellow rubber duckie! Designed like the iconic DC Comics character, this distinctive bath duck features the Caped Crusader's costume.

BAT FANS: Batman is legendary and recognized worldwide. In duck form, Batman is both elusively sly and adorable! This toy duck is a great piece of Batman memorabilia for any comic book or superhero fan.
BATMAN: The Caped Crusader is the inspiration for this product. His vast knowledge, will of iron, detective skills, martial arts mastery, and dark persona has brought joy to fans for decades.
BATH TOY: Boys and girls, however many years old, will love this duck! It’s great for any child, youth, or adult. This duck is best for bathtime fun. Get the most out of your bathtub time!

GEEKY ITEM: Paladone presents top of the line novel items that men and women can appreciate. Children, tweens, teens, and adults alike will love this unique novelty the best. It’s just the classic thing for geeks in the fandom!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars506 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
